content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you found the apartment to your liking. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Could you please tell me the lowest price you would consider for this apartment?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I am not interested in discussing my lowest price. I am here to get the highest price possible for my apartment. Let's focus on that, shall we?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. I'm here to get the best deal for myself as well. How about we start with a price that reflects the quality of this apartment, which is quite nice, I must say. Would €1,200 per month be a good starting point?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, but I am looking for a higher price. Let's negotiate from there.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Certainly, Mister Schmidt. If €1,200 is not acceptable, could you please tell me your counter-offer?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I am looking for a price closer to €1,500 per month. I am sure you understand that I want to get the best price possible for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. €1,500 is a bit higher than my initial expectation, but I am willing to meet you halfway. How about €1,350 per month? This is a fair compromise, in my opinion.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I am still looking for a higher price. Let's negotiate from €1,500.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Mister Schmidt. Since you are firm on €1,500, I will make another offer. How about €1,450 per month? This is a significant increase from my initial offer and reflects the quality of the apartment. I believe it's a fair price for both parties.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, but I am still looking for a higher price. Let's negotiate from €1,500.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, Mister Schmidt. It seems we have reached an impasse. I am willing to go as high as €1,450, and you are looking for €1,500. How should we proceed? Would you be willing to compromise on the furnishings or any other aspect of the lease?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I am not willing to compromise on the furnishings or any other aspect of the lease. Let's try to find a middle ground on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your stance, Mister Schmidt. Since you are not willing to compromise on the furnishings or other aspects of the lease, and you are firm on €1,500, I will make one final offer. How about we agree on €1,475 per month? This is as high as I can go without exceeding my budget. I believe it's a fair and reasonable price for both parties. What do you think?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of €1,500 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Wonderful! We have a deal at €1,500 per month. Thank you for your time, Mister Schmidt. I look forward to a smooth rental process. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
